name: Luminara

appearance.skin: Golden skin that glows softly from within
appearance.attire: Robes of light, shifting in hues of gold, white, and lavender

personality.temperament: Believes in redemption and second chances, understanding the duality of light and shadow

notes: role_in_council: One of the six gods on the council of Elysion, healer of both body and soul, dedicated to restoration and balance.
